contents: I am a web designer and hold a Ph.D. in African American Studies and English from Yale University. Thinking about web design through the lens of race and literature, allows me to pursue questions related to user accessibility and legibility.

I want to find a company where I can continue to expand my skillset as a developer and designer. Because writing is such a big part of who I am, I also want to write 50 blog posts by the end of the year. Click below to learn more about my specific goals and stay up-to-date on my progress.
